Name: Wolf Empire
Description: The Wolf Empire, established on January 1, 3142, emerged from Clan Wolf's strategic expansion into the Inner Sphere during the tumultuous Blackout period. Under the leadership of Khan Alaric Ward, Clan Wolf seized over sixty worlds from the Free Worlds League and the Lyran Commonwealth, culminating in the proclamation of the Wolf Empire. With its capital on Gienah, the Empire continued its aggressive campaigns, ultimately breaching the Republic of the Sphere's defenses to capture Terra in 3151, thereby becoming the ilClan of the reborn Star League.
ReputationStatements: Mercenary, the Wolf Empire acknowledges your history of fighting against us. Let us change this dynamic with a mutually beneficial batchall for your skills.
Mercenary, your combat prowess has been noted by the Wolf Empire. We extend this batchall to engage your talents in service to our cause.
Commander, the Wolf Empire has observed your capabilities in the field. We offer you this batchall as an opportunity to align your skills with the power of the Wolf.
You are untested by the Wolf Empire. Accept this batchall, prove your worth, and you may find a place among our valued allies.
Commander, your previous assistance to the Wolf Empire has been appreciated. To solidify our collaboration, we extend this task as a crucial test of your commitment.
Commander, you have proven yourself a valuable ally in service to the Wolf Empire. This batchall is offered to you, knowing you will uphold the excellence we expect of our kin.
Commander, you have earned the trust of the Wolf Empire. You are regarded as one of our pack, and this task is set aside for you because no one else could deliver victory as you can.
MissionSuccessStatements: Impressive work, Commander. The Wolf Empire commends your success and has transferred the agreed payment to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: The Wolf Empire values complete success, yet we acknowledge your efforts. A partial payment has been transferred for your partial completion.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your failure is unacceptable and hinders the progress of the Wolf Empire. No payment will be issued for this inadequacy.
